word_mean: 附着〔部〕：如肌肉附着于使之运动的骨
插入〔段〕：遗传学一种少见的非互补性易位，一染色体裂成三段，其中一段插入一非同源染色体的断裂区
在DNA或RNA链中增加一个或多个额外核苷酸的过程。

sentence.Network_en: An examination is carried out before the insertion of the tube.
sentence.Network_cn: 插入导管前先要进行检查。

sentence.Network_en: Sometimes the insertion of one word can change the meaning of a whole sentence.
sentence.Network_cn: 有时插入一个字可以改变全句的意义.

sentence.Network_en: He recorded an item for insertion in the programme.
sentence.Network_cn: 他录了一条消息插播到节目中。

list.abs: 插入（insert）模式，输入文本时使用；在正常模式下键入“i”（insert）或“a”（append）即可进入插入模式（也有另外一些命令，如“c”…
CAD快捷命令大全 ... B,*BLOCK 创建块... I,*INSERT 插入块 W,*WBLOCK “写块”对话框（将对象或块写入新图形文件）.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in sense 2): from late Latin insertio(n-), from Latin inserere (see insert)

entry.def: If you insert an object into something, you put the object inside it.

example.ex: He took a small key from his pocket and slowly inserted it into the lock...
example.tran: 他从口袋里掏出一把小钥匙,慢慢地插到锁眼里。

example.ex: Wait for a couple of minutes with your mouth closed before inserting the thermometer.
example.tran: 先合上嘴巴等几分钟再放进体温计。

entry.def: If you insert a comment into a piece of writing or a speech, you include it.

example.ex: They joined with the monarchists to insert a clause calling for a popular vote on the issue.
example.tran: 他们与君主主义者联手添加了一个条款,呼吁对该议题进行全民投票。

entry.tran: 插入物;(尤指夹在书刊中的)活页广告
entry.def: An insert is something that is inserted somewhere, especially an advertisement on a piece of paper that is placed between the pages of a book or magazine.

means.word_mean: 1. a message (spoken or written) that is introduced or inserted;

sentences.sentence: "with the help of his friend's interpolations his story was eventually told"

means.word_mean: 2. the act of putting one thing into another

auth_sentence.content: The launch and orbital insertion was flawless.
auth_sentence.res_content: The launch and orbital insertion was flawless.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The launch and orbital insertion was flawless.

auth_sentence.content: Viral insertion into critical genes has triggered lethal leukemias in several gene therapy recipients.
auth_sentence.res_content: Viral insertion into critical genes has triggered lethal leukemias in several gene therapy recipients.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Viral insertion into critical genes has triggered lethal leukemias in several gene therapy recipients.

auth_sentence.content: Continue the insertion reports and take a stand against obvious incidents instead of being a robot journalist.
auth_sentence.res_content: Continue the insertion reports and take a stand against obvious incidents instead of being a robot journalist.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Continue the insertion reports and take a stand against obvious incidents instead of being a robot journalist.

stems_affixes.word_buile: assert[v.断言,宣称;坚持;主张[权利,权威等]]+ive……的→adj.言语果断的,断言的
de离开+sert加入,插入,连接→不再加入→抛弃→沙漠[无连接,联系的地方]
insert[v.插入,嵌入;登载 n.插入物]+ion表名词→n.插入,插入物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 断言,宣称;坚持;主张[权利,权威等]
stems_affixes.word_buile: as加强+sert加入,插入,连接→强行加入[观点]→断言
de离开+sert加入,插入,连接→不再加入→抛弃→沙漠[无连接,联系的地方]
ex出,表示超出+sert加入,插入,连接→exert尽[力],努力
ex出+sert加入,插入,连接→插出去→突出
